conbody.p: HPROF heap dump is a snapshot of java heap at a certain time. A full GC is triggered before the heap dump is written so it contains information about the remaining objects.

ul.li:
All Objects
Class, fields, primitive values and references

All Classes
Classloader, name, super class, static fields

Garbage Collection Roots
Objects defined to be reachable by the JVM

conbody.p: A heap dump does not contain allocation information so it cannot resolve questions like who had created the objects and where they have been created.
